channel.title: The Cloudcast on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in The Cloudcast on purpleidea.com

item.title: Linuxcon day three, Wednesday
item.description: After hacking away on Monday and Tuesday and meeting fellow nerds IRL, I’ve landed even more changes to puppet-gluster. My git master branch now sits at 47 commits. $ git clone https://github.com/purpleidea/puppet-gluster.git Cloning into 'puppet-gluster'... remote: Counting objects: 317, done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (144/144), done. remote: Total 317 (delta 187), reused 275 (delta 148) Receiving objects: 100% (317/317), 82.17 KiB | 12.00 KiB/s, done. Resolving deltas: 100% (187/187), done. $ cd puppet-gluster/ $ git log | grep '^commit' | wc -l 47 $ git log | head commit <a href="https://github.
